subject: Re: Order #SSN5530 confirmed

conversations.body_text: Hi gmbc,    We apologize for the delay. Everything will be shipped out today, please don't worry.

So now is the 10. Has the order been shipped out at the 8th like you promised? Otherwise I want to cancel it.

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

-------- Original Message --------

Hey, I haven’t received any update on this. I ordered on the 30rd December, and you told me one week later at the 6th January you will be shipping today. Now it’s the 12th January so one week later and you still didn’t ship my order.

What’s wrong here? Please give me information. If you don’t ship until Wednesday I will cancel the order and if you don’t react I will go via PayPal.

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

-------- Original Message --------

Hi gmbc,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. Here is your shipping tracking link. The first package has already been shipped, and the other one will be dispatched within the next couple of days. I'm sorry for the delay this has caused you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047229133298,SF6047229133313
